Actions.Name: Reel In
Actions.Description: The fisher moves its lure up to 4 spaces towards it, then shoves all adjacent characters to the lure the same amount. Characters can pass a save to reduce this shove to 1.

Actions.Name: Spit Up
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters take [fray] damage, are poisoned, and must save or become winded. Poisoned characters fail the save.

Actions.Name: The Maw
Actions.Effects: If more than one character is adjacent to the Kinfisher, it chooses targets randomly. It cannot target summons. Then, the fisher's lure is shoved to 3 spaces away from it.

Actions.Name: Gnash
Actions.Description: The Kingfisher dashes 1 as it flops forward, then deals 2 damage to all adjacent foes.

Actions.Name: Submerge
Actions.Description: The Kinfisher submerges into the ground, teleporting 5 spaces, then resurfaces, even to an occupied area. When it resurfaces, characters in its area take [fray] damage, are placed in the closest adjacent space of its choice, then shoved 1.
